title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 32.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 32.2 - Application

State Regulations

Except as otherwise specifically provided, this Part
applies to all ski tows and other passenger tramways to which section
202-c
of the Labor

Law applies and to the owners and operators of such equipment and to their
employees. It does not apply to cog railways, or to material handling
equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
32.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
